means: 不决断，优柔寡断，犹豫不定

sentence.Network_en: A lack of certainty that often leads to irresolution.
sentence.Network_cn: 疑惑缺少肯定而导致犹豫不决.

sentence.Network_en: Shall we gather strength by irresolution and inaction?
sentence.Network_cn: 我们迟疑不决、无所作为就能积聚力量 吗 ?

sentence.Network_en: His countenance betrayed irresolution and reluctance.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的脸部表情露出犹豫和勉强.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(I3) ... irresolutely 优柔寡断地 irresolution 优柔寡断 irresolvable 不能解决的.
★最新整理的GRE反义词汇-GRE留学外语考试... ... Gossamer 轻薄的，没有物质的 Irresolution 犹豫不决 Laconic 简洁的.
美国大学翻译中文38_书面语语_DuSystem... ... 无定形三硫化锑 kermes 无定见 irresolution 无实体 incorporeity.

means.word_mean: 1. doubt concerning two or more possible alternatives or courses of action;

sentences.sentence: "his indecision was only momentary but the opportunity was lost"

means.word_mean: 2. the trait of being irresolute; lacking firmness of purpose

auth_sentence.content: Yet the sense of irresolution, of bewilderment, did not entirely lift.
